meanings.definition: Below the orbit of a celestial body.
meanings.sent1: The rocket flew suborbital, just beneath the moon's path.
meanings.sent2: The satellite remained suborbital, never entering the orbit of Earth.
meanings.sent3: The alien spaceship played a game of tag, always staying suborbital to Earth.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared suborbital, never quite reaching the stars.
meanings.sent5: The bird's flight was suborbital, skimming the tops of the trees.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a trajectory that does not reach the orbit of a celestial body.
meanings.sent1: The suborbital flight lasted only a short time.
meanings.sent2: The suborbital rocket quickly returned to Earth.
meanings.sent3: The suborbital journey felt like a rollercoaster ride.
meanings.sent4: His suborbital ambitions kept him grounded.
meanings.sent5: The suborbital mission was a thrilling adventure.
